body:
Overview

Challenges are suggested by Engage based on the industry theme of the company. For example, Fintech companies can expect questions tailored to the Fintech theme.Â 

We currently support question themes across industries such as e-commerce, Fintech, and Automotive.

Review and Publish the Challenge

  1. To review the questions, click the arrow in the Action column against each question.
  2. The questions are displayed.
  3. You may want to review the questions, before publishing the challenge.

  4. You can also use the Try Challenge option to test the questions.

  5. If you have different requirements from what is recommended, you can write to engage-challenges@hackerrank.com , located at the bottom of the challenge list. This email is then sent out to the Content, Professional Services, and Product teams of Engage, ensuring a response to you within one business day.
  6. After you have reviewed the challenge, click Publish.
  7. A confirmation prompt appears to confirm the publishing of Challenge.
  8. Click Confirm.
title: Set Up the Event Challenge
